articles.title: Belize football team bus held up by 'insurgents on motorcycles' in Haiti ahead of 2022 World Cup qualifier
articles.description: Belize's football federation (FFB) expressed "disappointment and disgust" on Monday after the team bus carrying the squad from the airport to their hotel was stopped by "an uproar of insurgents with assault rifles on motorcycles."

articles.author: Jackson Dill and Brandon Miller, CNN
articles.title: By the end of the century, summer weather could last half a year (and that's not a good thing)
articles.description: Summer weather could grow to half a year in length by the end of this century if no mitigation efforts are done on climate change, according to a new study. In about the past 60 years, summer has increased by 17 days on average across the globe.
